title: Reach Out

content:
Hi, I‚Äôm Duncan Maina ‚Äî a cybersecurity trainer, SOC analyst, digital forensics practitioner, and researcher in cyber resilience. I thrive at the intersection of technical security, education, and real-world problem solving, with a passion for building practical, impact-driven security solutions.
I currently work as a Cybersecurity Trainer at Cybershujaa, where I mentor and train students in offensive security, defensive operations, digital forensics, and cyber risk management. I also deliver professional lectures and talks under ACIC at institutions including the Kenya School of Government (KSG), University of Nairobi (UoN), and Serianu.
What I Do#Security Operations & Blue Teaming
SOC monitoring, threat detection, and incident response EDR, SIEM, and SOAR integrations Log analysis and threat hunting Offensive Security
Web, network, and infrastructure penetration testing CTF design and lab environment deployment (B2R, exam-style machines) Reconnaissance & OSINT operations Digital Forensics
Evidence acquisition & analysis Log, memory, and disk forensics Incident reconstruction and reporting Cyber Risk & Resilience
Cybersecurity maturity assessments Risk quantification and KPI dashboards Control frameworks and governance alignment Training & Mentorship
Curriculum development Student performance review Exam setting and grading Hands-on lab facilitation Projects & Research Interests#I actively design and build security-focused systems, including:
ClickSecure ‚Äì A phishing detection and prevention web application Fake News Detection System ‚Äì NLP-powered credibility analysis platform WhatsApp Scam & Message Analysis Bot ‚Äì Automated threat scoring tool CTF & Cyber Range Environments for training and assessments My research interests include:
AI in cybersecurity Threat intelligence automation Cyber risk quantification Digital forensics tooling Security analytics & detection engineering Technical Stack#Languages & Scripting:
Python, Bash
Security Tools:
Burp Suite, Metasploit, Nmap, Wireshark, Autopsy, Volatility, Hashcat, FFUF, Splunk
Platforms & Virtualization:
Kali Linux, Ubuntu, VMware, VirtualBox, AWS
Frameworks & Concepts:
MITRE ATT&CK, NIST, ISO 27001, CVEQ, SOC Operations, Threat Modeling
Beyond Cybersecurity#Outside the keyboard:
I enjoy dancing, creative thinking, and breaking convention I‚Äôm always learning ‚Äî currently sharpening my Python and automation skills My Philosophy#‚ÄúSecurity is not just about tools ‚Äî it‚Äôs about people, process, and purpose.‚Äù
I believe cybersecurity should be practical, measurable, and human-centered. My mission is to train capable defenders, build resilient systems, and continuously push the boundaries of how we secure the digital world.
title: About Me
